contents: Explore UIC  Visit Virtually  Apply    S      Search Input     Submit        M       Request Information        Home  Undergraduate  You are here     Home  Undergraduate  You are here                          Due to the COVID-19 pandemic UIC continues to accept undergraduate first-year and transfer applications for the Fall 2020 semester.            Join our list    We'll keep you posted.  Prospective undergraduate students can sign up to receive personalized information about the university through email and in the mail.
